skins.shipDescription: B-class destroyer ©` Bulldog, Hull Number H91!
skins.selfIntroduction: I, Bulldog, am the youngest of the B class. My accomplishments were the acquisition of encoded transmission machines, codebooks, and the witnessing of the signing of the surrender treaty. If you are not an idiot, Commander, you should know the worth of such accomplishments.
skins.acquisition: Good day. I'm B class' Bulldog. ...I'm an adult so please do not judge me by my looks. I hope you aren't an adult who does that, Commander. I'll be in your care.
skins.login: I was thinking you'd be back soon since you think about the fleet...
skins.details: I'm happy that I'm so treasured by you, Commander, but please don't have any weird expectations. Yes, weird expectations.
skins.secretaryIdle2: The best thing I can do is submarine subjugation
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, if your hand is on my head for more than 3 seconds, I'll bite down on it, you hear?
skins.secretaryTouch: What is it? If it's your personal needs, Commander, I'll have to refuse.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Lil' B! Lil' X! Target the Commander!
